thread.title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Martha Stewart, Reese Witherspoon, And Steven Spielberg Have To Say
thread.title_full: They Said What?!: Find Out What Martha Stewart, Reese Witherspoon, And Steven Spielberg Have To Say

title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Martha Stewart, Reese Witherspoon, And Steven Spielberg Have To Say
text: Like Ever wonder what’s on the mind of today’s most notable people? Well, don’t miss our unbelievable roundup of the best and most talked about quotes of the day: “ Whenever I am responding to a wedding invitation and I have to select a meal, I will always cross out the options they provided and just write in ‘surprise me.’ It’s fun, it’s unique, and it gives the happy couple something to look forward to on their wedding day. ” —Martha Stewart On the perfect gift “ I wasn’t really the book-smart type when I was in school. I was more the type of smart where you can tell if someone is wearing a hat or not. I was almost never wrong. ” —Reese Witherspoon On intelligence “ Let’s get one thing straight: If it weren’t for movies, nobody outside the government would have any idea what a helicopter even was. ” —Steven Spielberg
